p: HEK293T (human embryonic kidney epithelial cell line) and Raw264.7 (murine macrophage cell line) cell lines were cultured in Dulbecco’s modified minimal essential medium (DMEM) supplemented with 100 U penicillin-streptomycin and 10% fetal bovine serum at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere containing 5% CO 2.
